name: commons-systems
description: Agentic coding workflow patterns and skills for managing GitHub issues, worktrees, and iterative development loops

plugins.name: worktree
plugins.description: Initialize work on new issues in git worktrees

plugins.name: wiggum-loop
plugins.description: Generic iterative loop pattern with evaluation and convergence

plugins.name: issue-workflow
plugins.description: Manage end-to-end implementation of GitHub issues from planning through review

plugins.name: issue-workflow-bundle
plugins.description: Complete GitHub issue workflow bundle including worktree setup, iterative development loops, and end-to-end issue management. Includes: worktree, wiggum-loop, and issue-workflow skills.

plugins.name: write-instructions
plugins.description: Invoke when editing Claude configuration files (CLAUDE.md, .claude/rules/*.md, .claude/agents/*.md, .claude/skills/*/SKILL.md) to ensure instructions follow best practices
